casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Cornelius Hargrove (11659)

Freedman, Schaller and Spear, Js.

Argued February 15 decision released March 8, 1994 Dante R. Gallucci, special public defender, filed a brief for the appellant (defendant). Richard F. Jacobson, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Gerard P. Eisenman, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
